name: help
optional: `command` the command you want help with. Default: none.

name: wiki
desc: Displays wiki, discord and bot information.

name: leaderboard
desc: Displays the top users by sort of the wiki.
optional:
`sort` the sorting method. Possible values: editcount, registration. Default: editcount.
`limit` how many users to show on leaderboard. Default: 15.
`reverse` whether to reverse the sort. Default: False.

name: user
desc: Gets information about a wiki user.
optional: `username` the user to look up. Can be an @ or wiki username. Default: linked user wiki name.

name: page
required: `pagename` the name of the page to look up.
